div.ab:
وستّين حزمة كتّان ندفها يخرجها
وبعّضها للحسين بن أيّوب
من الصّك الّذي عليه بها
فلم يبق للحسين بن أيّوب
على محمّد بن اسمعپل من هذا الصّك
قليل ولا كثير وكتب
الحسين بن أيّوب بخطّه
وكتب الحسن بن أيّوب بخطّه

*******
wa sittīna ḥuzmaẗ kattān:in nadafa yuḫriǧu hā
wa baʿʿaḍa hā li l ḥusayni bni ʾayyūba
mina ăṣ ṣakki ăllaḏī ʿalay hi bi hā
fa lam yabqa li l ḥusayni bni ʾayyūba
ʿalà muḥammadi bni ʾismāʿīla min hāḏā ăṣ ṣakki
qalīl:un wa lā kaṯīr:un wa kataba
ăl ḥusaynu bnu ʾayyūba bi ḫaṭṭi hi
wa kataba ăl ḥasanu bnu ʾayyūba bi ḫaṭṭi hi

and sixty bundles flax which he cleaned (?)
and divided into portions for al-Ḥusain b. Ayyûb
arising from the bill, which obliges him to it,
so that there does not remain to the credit of al-Ḥusain b. Ayyûb,
to the debit of Muḥammad b. Ismaʿîl anything of (the content of) this bill
either little or much, and
al-Ḥasain b. Ayyûb has written (it) in his (own) handwriting;
and al-Ḥasan b. Ayyûb has written (it) in his (own) handwriting
